org.hkijena.jipipe.api

Class JIPipeProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.jipipe.api.JIPipeProject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JIPipeValidatable

    public class JIPipeProject
extends Object
implements JIPipeValidatable
    A JIPipe project. It contains all information to setup and run an analysis

        public static Set<JIPipeDependency> loadDependenciesFromJson(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)

        Returns:

      • setWorkDirectory

        public void setWorkDirectory(Path workDirectory)
        Sets the folder where the project is currently working in. This information is passed to the algorithms to adapt to the work directory if needed (usually ony Filesystem nodes are affected)
        Parameters:
        workDirectory - Project work directory

      • getDeactivatedAlgorithms

        public Set<JIPipeGraphNode> getDeactivatedAlgorithms()
        Returns a list of all nodes that cannot be executed or are deactivated by the user. This method works on transitive deactivation (e.g. a dependency is deactivated).
        Returns:
        list of deactivated nodes

      • getIntermediateAlgorithms

        public Set<JIPipeGraphNode> getIntermediateAlgorithms()
        Returns all nodes that have at least one connected algorithm that uses its generated data.
        Returns:
        Intermediate nodes

      • getHeavyIntermediateAlgorithmOutputSlots

        public Set<JIPipeDataSlot> getHeavyIntermediateAlgorithmOutputSlots()
        Returns a list of all nodes that generate heavy data (JIPipeHeavyData) and are intermediate (see getIntermediateAlgorithms()). Skips all nodes that do not save outputs.
        Returns:
        intermediate nodes with heavy data

      • getPipelineParameters

        public JIPipeProjectInfoParameters getPipelineParameters()
        Returns the global parameters for this pipeline
        Returns:
        global parameters

        Repairs restored compartment outputs
